content: octopus cat toy www craftkitten com original pattern by jennifer reeve materials scrap yarn scrap yarn in contrasting color crochet hook 1 size smaller than recommended for gauge 1 stitch marker stuffing catnip if desired i suggest pellets as they are less messy you can find them for a good deal at http //www drsfostersmith com/ note head is worked in a spiral carrying a marker to indicate beginning of round head chain 4 join with slip_stitch to beg chain to form ring abbreviations round 1 work 8 single_crochet in ring chain = chain round 2 work 2 single_crochet in each st single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase around place marker on 1st slip_stitch = slip_stitch stitch continue to keep marker repeat = repeat on first st of each round 16sc rnds 3-7 work 1 single_crochet in each st 16sc at this point fill with scrap yarn or stuffing & catnip if desired round 8 decrease around repeat till closed do not fasten_off arms chain 10 skip 1 chain single_crochet in each chain back to base slip_stitch in base of head repeat 7 more times for a total of 8 arms fasten_off with contrasting scrap yarn sew on eyes throw to your closest kitty watch wackiness ensue this pattern was created while making toys to donate to sf spca so when you make these please consider making a couple for the needy kitties visit this site for more info http //www sfspca org/news/050203_kittyknitting shtml craft kitten also grants permission to make and sell these cat toys for charitable causes www craftkitten com © craft kitten 2006 all rights reserved do not copy or distribute without permission sale of finished items is prohibited
